name: PENNSYLVANIA DEMOCRATIC PARTY and Emilio A. Vazquez, Appellants v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF STATE, the Hon. Pedro A. Cortes, and Jonathan Marks, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Democratic Party v. Pennsylvania Department of State

parties: PENNSYLVANIA DEMOCRATIC PARTY and Emilio A. Vazquez, Appellants v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF STATE, the Hon. Pedro A. Cortes, and Jonathan Marks, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 10th day of March, 2017, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
158 A.3d 618
PENNSYLVANIA DEMOCRATIC PARTY and Emilio A. Vazquez, Appellants v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF STATE, the Hon. Pedro A. Cortes, and Jonathan Marks, Appellees
